short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Computes the cryptographic hash of your downloads and checks them against the hashdd.com database.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Computes the cryptographic hash of your download, then queries the hashdd.com API to identify if the file is known good or bad. Once your download completes, click the hashdd extension icon, then drag and drop the download into the analyze field.
